name: AutoRepair Manager Project
observations: Multi-tenant garage management system built on Next.js 15 + Supabase
Uses TanStack Query for server state management
Implements Row Level Security (RLS) for data isolation
Features vehicle reception, repair tracking, inventory management, and payment processing

name: Inventory Management Module
observations: Uses data tables with sorting, filtering, and pagination
Displays spare parts with stock levels and pricing
Shows color-coded stock status (Out of Stock, Low Stock, In Stock)
Recently translated to support i18n with next-intl
Modified columns.tsx to use createColumns function for dynamic translations
Updated page.tsx to use useTranslations hook
Added translation keys for stock status, column headers, and actions
Implemented Vietnamese translations for all inventory UI elements

name: Translation System
observations: Message files located in messages/en.json and messages/vi.json
Uses useTranslations hook for component-level translations
